description: An awesome take at a modern browser! Fast, simple, minimal. Reminds me of the first versions of Firefox (in a good way), but this is so much more. Ever wanted to create a website? Create an index.html, click on the "new website" button and the entire web stack is at your disposal; finally, the original idea of the internet is alive again.
summary: Amazing! Suitable for daily use & nice UX

description:
Quite good as a dat browser.
It has few choices I consider damaging for the web: based on Electron (another win for the web googlification) and no IPv6 support (supporting the view that "it's not important").
summary: Well curated UI, electron based though

description: too old version in repo, download a newer one from the official website https://beakerbrowser.com/install/
summary: Outdated version, but very great app

description: I love the idea of decentralized web
Not many people in this service, but better start somewhere!
summary: Great Idea, no problems thus far

description: Looks and feel great ! Very stable...
